definition: being precisely fitting and right, a meeting at which a number of athletic contests are held, contend against an opponent in a sport, game, or battle
details:
adjective
- being precisely fitting and right
= example: being precisely fitting and right
= synonyms: fitting
noun
- a meeting at which a number of athletic contests are held
= synonyms: sports meeting
verb
- contend against an opponent in a sport, game, or battle
= synonyms: play
- fill or meet a want or need
= synonyms: fill, satisfy, fulfill, fulfil
- be in direct physical contact with
= synonyms: contact
- meet by design
- come together
= example: come together
= synonyms: encounter
- undergo or suffer
= example: undergo or suffer
= synonyms: suffer
- collect in one place
= synonyms: gather
- get together socially or for a specific purpose
= synonyms: get together
- satisfy or fulfill
= example: satisfy or fulfill
= synonyms: match, cope with
- get to know
- satisfy a condition or restriction
= example: satisfy a condition or restriction
= synonyms: fit
- be adjacent or come together
= synonyms: converge
- experience as a reaction
= synonyms: encounter
